0: The pools where very good with swim up bars nice snack bar at the side the beach which is private was very good
The restaurants offer a wide variety of food choices and the buffet is excellent
Nanos is a buffet style restraunt and had everything you could imagine
Other free pool activities were the wonderful pool bar salsa and belly dance lessons and festive pool games and music
The service was great excellent food especially the Vendo restaurant the ocean was rough was not able to swim but you can not control the weather right
We love this area of Cancun because it is away from the bars and clubs but a short bus or cab ride when you want it
Major applause to the pastry teamAlso the ice cream here is TO DIE FOR
there is an array of restaurants to choose from and all of the food is great
also had pork with a delicious sauce and sides
Food was excellent especially NAOS restaurant which does not require reservations and is available for breakfast lunch and dinner
1: Pizza was never offered at the buffet restaurant which is very desirable for kids as fries were not available every day
They always asked us which restaurant we wanted to book for the dinners
The only place we could find is at Thai Restaurant
Our only disappointment were the meals and the restaurants
The Naos buffet was good but we also tried a bunch of other restaurants one worth mentioning is blue agave and Enzo
there is two omelette stations in the morning at the buffet
The only thing we wished for was for than one swim up bar for the pools
Friendly staff food was not all that good however there was no lines on the buffet or restaurant
Food for below expectation with poor presentation no steakhouse in 5 star hotel
With so many other options larger pools more swim up bars better service and activities we will not be coming back here
